entry.title: Braid Inlay Bangle
entry.summary:
Vendor: temerity jewelry
Type: bracelet
Price: 96.00 - 124.00 (12 variants)

an update to our best selling slice inlay bangle, the braid inlay bangle's delicate twists clutch a pod of inlaid stones.  braided by hand and cast in either brass or sterling silver, with inlay of turquoise, jet, lapis, coral, or malachite.

each bangle measures 8" around with a 2.5" diameter.

entry.title: Plait Cuff
entry.summary:
Vendor: Temerity Jewelry
Type: bracelet
Price: 90.00

inspired by the ephemeral nature of textiles & weaving, the plait cuff is cast from a combination of hand-braided and tied ropes. a high polish finish draws out the texture and variations of the original material.

slightly oval, with a 1" opening and an approximate 7.5" diameter.

entry.title: Slice Bangle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Temerity Jewelry
Type: bracelet
Price: 82.00 - 110.00 (12 variants)

we've taken our bestselling slice inlay rings to the next level with these delicately textured inlay bangles.  available in brass or sterling silver, we love the look, feel, and beautiful tinkling sound of them stacked up in a combination of jet, lapis, kyanite and malachite crushed stone inlay.   

sold individually- also available in a set of two here. each bangle measures 8" around with a 2.5" diameter.

entry.title: Slice Bangle Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Temerity Jewelry
Type: bracelet
Price: 150.00 - 205.00 (72 variants)

we've taken our bestselling slice inlay rings to the next level with these delicately textured inlay bangles.  available in brass or sterling silver, we love the look, feel, and beautiful tinkling sound of them stacked up in a combination of jet, coral, lapis, kyanite and malachite crushed stone inlay.   

available in a set of two, or individually here. each bangle measures 8" around with a 2.5" diameter.

entry.title: Box Braid Cuff
entry.summary:
Vendor: Temerity Jewelry
Type: bracelet
Price: 95.00

we've taken the traditional box braid bracelet and updated it in cuff form.  

braided by hand from leather cord and cast in brass, the cuff has a high polished finish to show off the natural variations in the cording.  the exterior maintains the rough hewn texture of the original material, while the interior of the cuff has been polished smooth for comfort & ease of wear every day.

the box braid cuff is slighly oval with a 1" opening and a 2" diameter.

entry.title: Iona Bangle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Temerity Jewelry
Type: bracelet
Price: 94.00

inspired by the ephemeral nature of textiles & weaving, the iona bangle is cast from a hand woven and knotted fishtail braid.  a high polish finish draws out the texture and variations of the original material.  it's the perfect addition to an armful of bangles for summertime and a modern update to the traditional friendship bracelet.

measures 8" around with a 2.5" diameter.

entry.title: Lydian Bangle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Temerity Jewelry
Type: bracelet
Price: 106.00

an organically carved, cast and textured bead slides freely on an oval brass bangle with an approximate 2.5" diameter.

entry.title: Rostrum Cuff
entry.summary:
Vendor: Temerity Jewelry
Type: bracelet
Price: 134.00

a slightly adjustable 6" brass cuff with subtle spear terminations, culminating in a hand carved 2" textured asymmetric point.

entry.title: Halcyon Cuff
entry.summary:
Vendor: Temerity Jewelry
Type: bracelet
Price: 134.00

the occurrence of astral bell signifies the desire of an ethereal being to make contact across the veil; to manifest its presence across the boundaries of the physical world.

the oval halcyon cuff measures 6" around with a 2.5" diameter and double bell terminations.  bell pendants are hand carved and textured from wax and cast in brass.

entry.title: Maylin Handpiece
entry.summary:
Vendor: Temerity Jewelry
Type: bracelet
Price: 145.00

rife with the symbolism of the well, the maylin handpiece is symbolic of purity, depth of emotion, and destinies yet to be realized.

6.5" sterling silver chain bracelet with a hand forged brass hook and eye closure, 2" curved brass pendant that lays against the top of the hand, and sterling silver chain ring.

entry.title: Vortex Cuff
entry.summary:
Vendor: Temerity Jewelry
Type: bracelet
Price: 115.00

the vortex cuff, rife with the symbolism of the well, is symbolic of purity, depth of emotion, and destinies yet to be realized.

oval cuff with a 2" diameter, hand carved from wax and cast in brass.

entry.title: Echo Bangle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Temerity Jewelry
Type: bracelet
Price: 130.00

﻿exemplifying the space between darkness and light, the echo bangle is comprised of fifteen hand carved circular textured wells, oxidized and burnished to highlight form and texture. rife with the symbolism of the well, it exemplifies purity, depth of emotion, and destinies yet to be realized.

oval bangle with a 2.5" diameter, hand carved from wax and cast in brass.

entry.title: Auric Bangle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Temerity Jewelry
Type: bracelet
Price: 98.00 - 205.00 (4 variants)

the auric bangle is inspired by the concept of the auric egg- the eternal, ethereal principles of the soul that accompany its bearer through each incarnation- often perceived as an egg-shaped aura.

egg-shaped bangle with an approximate 3" diameter, hand-forged in brass or sterling silver with a subtle graduated point.

entry.title: Neith Cuff
entry.summary:
Vendor: Temerity Jewelry
Type: bracelet
Price: 175.00

plume inspired cuff with bezel set stone terminations.

hand forged in brass, 6.5" circumference with a 2.5" diameter. choose from hematite/carnelian, carnelian/moonstone, or hematite/moonstone

entry.title: Luxor Cuff
entry.summary:
Vendor: Temerity Jewelry
Type: bracelet
Price: 92.00

geometric cuff with angular sloped sides, carved from wax and cast in brass.

oval with a 2" diameter.

*model wears two luxor cuffs stacked.

measures 8" around with a 2.5" diameter.

entry.title: Phaedra Bracelet
entry.summary:
Vendor: Temerity Jewelry
Type: bracelet
Price: 120.00 - 185.00 (2 variants)

in egyptian mythology, the nightly blooming of the lotus flower symbolized the triumph of light and life over death and darkness.

lotus inspired cuff, with an 8" circumference and a 2.5" diameter. cast in brass or sterling silver.

measures 8" around with a 2.5" diameter.

entry.title: Sundial Bracelet
entry.summary:
Vendor: Temerity Jewelry
Type: bracelet
Price: 117.00

a playful take on the modern wristwatch, the sundial bracelet looks amazing worn higher up on the forearm.

hand-carved from wax and cast in brass. measures 8" around with a 2.5" diameter.
